title: Marketplace Roundtable #2: Bracing For The Fed And The Trade War With Kirk Spano
description: The themes of passive/algorithmic investing taking over the market long term, and the trade war and Federal Reserve in the near term loom large over our second Marketplace Roundtable podcast. Margin of Safety Investing author Kirk Spano discusses his investing approach and the importance of quantitative and macro analysis, the macro risks in the market today, whether he's in a defensive or offensive position, and the sector that most interests him Topics covered: 1:15 minute mark - The core 4 approach Kirk
